function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective and inefficient treatment of wastewater due to change in water pattern and decline in water demand, leading to biosolid deposition, odour, and corrosion.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High concentration of pharmaceutical products in wastewater due to increased demand, posing challenges for old age wastewater treatment plants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater from covid-19 patients, highlighting the risk of spreading the virus through inadequate treatment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of reagents and probes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor predictive accuracy of model selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Digital revolution vulnerabilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Using arima model for covid-19 prediction and forecasting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quantifying sar-cov-2 infectiousness using contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost analysis of wbe and clinical screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex model evaluation may lead to inaccuracies in covid-19 predictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of vaccination and immunity rates in the model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for behavioral and social factors impacting disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex model representation may lead to misunderstanding or misinterpretation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clarity around model variables and equations may hinder effective analysis and decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sar-cov-2 in a smart city due to transmission dynamics and multiple dimensions of the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of re-infection and loss of immunity over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undetected infected persons contributing to disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete assessment of sars-cov-2 prevalence in wastewater may lead to underestimation of infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in decay rate calculations may result in inaccurate estimation of virus survivability in wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate modeling of virus spreading in smart cities may lead to ineffective pandemic control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of antimicrobial resistance genes args in influent’s wastewater using qpcr technology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy issues in wastewater-based epidemiology wbe , leading to potential stigmatization in certain communities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in wbe surveillance of water and wastewater concerning covid-19, including the non-existence of biomarkers discovery pipeline, accounting for population size fluctuations, need for biomarker extraction technology, and lack of analytical tools.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large-scale population surveillance may lead to privacy concerns and data misuse.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wastewater surveillance may lead to complacency in individual testing and personal hygiene.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to identify specific infected individuals and locations may result in ineffective contact tracing and targeted containment measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in hospital water, tap water, and domestic sewage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Persistence of sars-cov-2 at low temperatures and in urine and stools","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreasing efficacy of disinfectant techniques in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater treatment leading to presence of enveloped and non-enveloped pathogens in the water system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of enveloped viruses in the water system due to inadequate treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 through water systems in developing countries with inadequate treatment infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage water","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of rt-qpcr assays for sars-cov-2 rna detection in water","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enveloped and non-enveloped pathogens in the water system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 from animal to human","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated wastewater flow to the wastewater treatment plant","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct consumption of contaminated water by rural and urban communities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 genetics in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 in untreated water","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of rural and urban water with sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of low-and middle-income countries due to epidemiological factors, transmission challenges, and high demand for the health system.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated wastewater as a source of disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through respiratory droplets and contaminated surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of contact tracking, testing, and isolation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of covid-19 in untreated drinking water and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete context for numerical values","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Data entry errors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete source
